questions.question: Brian Sipe was named NFL MVP in 1980
What player was drafted by the Browns in three sports?
This dummy said "Brian Sipe is the best QB in the league."

answers.a: Terry (I know I am not smart) Bradshaw

questions.question: What LOSER did we pick in the first round of the 1980 draft?

answers.a: Mad Dog in a Meathouse Junkin

questions.question: In 1981 the Kardiac Kids racked up another winning record.
